channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Driver Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Driver Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-1577|2024-08-01T19:35:25.372Z -- lenovo -- driver%20manager
item.description: A path hijacking vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Driver Manager prior to version 3.1.1307.1308 that could allow a local user to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-1577|2024-07-31T20:29:31.733Z -- lenovo -- driver%20manager
item.description: A path hijacking vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Driver Manager prior to version 3.1.1307.1308 that could allow a local user to execute code with elevated privileges.
